subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch took advantage of a late caution to regain the lead and held on for the final 16 laps to win the N.R.A. 500 in Fort Worth.
snippet: Kyle Busch took advantage of a late caution to regain the lead and held on for the final 16 laps to win the N.R.A. 500 in Fort Worth.
